prompt: Photorealistic image of a professional art appraiser, mid-50s, wearing glasses and tweed jacket, meticulously examining the surface texture of an Old Master painting on an easel using a large magnifying glass. The composition is a medium shot, landscape orientation (16:9), focusing on the appraiser's hands, the magnifying glass, and a detailed section of the painting (perhaps showing craquelure). Soft, directional light illuminates the canvas and the appraiser's face, highlighting concentration. Background is slightly blurred, suggesting a quiet, professional gallery setting. Style: Cinematic realism, shallow depth of field. --ar 16:9
name: art-appraisers-image-1.png

prompt: Wide-angle, photorealistic shot of an art appraiser's sophisticated office workspace. Landscape (16:9) view shows a large mahogany desk cluttered with antique art reference books, auction catalogs, a laptop open to an art database, valuation reports, and specialized tools like calipers and a loupe. A small, framed abstract painting rests on a stand on the desk, awaiting assessment. Warm, natural light streams from a large window on the left, mixing with the glow from a classic green banker's lamp on the desk. Style: Professional, scholarly, detailed realism. --ar 16:9
name: art-appraisers-image-2.png

prompt: Photorealistic scene depicting an art appraiser, a woman in professional business attire, presenting a formal valuation report to an elderly, well-dressed couple (clients) in their elegant living room. The appraiser gestures towards a significant modern sculpture placed prominently near a large window overlooking a city view. The landscape (16:9) composition captures the interaction, showing the three figures, the sculpture, and the luxurious room setting. Lighting is soft, ambient daylight. Style: Documentary, sophisticated, high-detail photorealism. --ar 16:9
name: art-appraisers-image-3.png

prompt: Professional photorealistic image of an art appraiser specializing in decorative arts, carefully examining an 18th-century porcelain vase. The appraiser, wearing white cotton gloves, holds the vase against a neutral backdrop, possibly in a museum conservation lab or a high-end auction house viewing room. The landscape (16:9) format shows the appraiser from the waist up, the vase held centrally, with shelves of other artifacts subtly blurred in the background. Lighting is bright, even, and clinical, highlighting the form and glaze of the object. Style: Clean, informative, high-fidelity photorealism. --ar 16:9
